metadata.title: CVE-2024-46731 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/pm: fix the Out-of-bounds read warningusing index i - 1U may beyond element indexfor mc_data[] when i = 0.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
